page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: In our block two villages are separated by the{M4 motorway.}The villages are{Stanton St Quintin}and {Kington St Michael.}It is mostly countryside. The nearest towns are {Chippenham}and{Malmesbury.}There is another village called Leigh Delamere, in{Leigh Delamere}there is a Granada motorway service station which sells petrol and there is a shop and a playground. Most of the houses are made of old stone and half have stone slate roofs. Most of the farm land is used for grazing cattle and some is for growing crops. There are at least 3 big farms on the block. Just off the block there is an RAF camp. Most of the houses on the camp were built before the war. Most of them are not on our block but some of them are.
